warmly.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: We were warmly welcomed by the villagers.
warmly.translation[0].definitions[1].def: in a way that makes something or someone warm
warmly.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Pat wrapped the baby up warmly.
Make sure that the children are dressed warmly.
warmly.translation[0].definitions[2].def: in a way that shows that you like something very much
